description: DiskCountersView displays the system counters of each disk drive in your system, including the total number of read/write operations and the total number of read/write bytes. It also displays general drive information, like disk name, partition number, partition location, and so on. You can save the information into text/html/csv/xml file or copy it to the clipboard.
shortcuts: NirSoft\DiskCountersView - Show disk drive read_write counters
